member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.SomiodController.ValidateXmlAgainstSchema(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Validates an XML document against an XSD schema file.
member.param: The file path to the XSD schema.
member.returns: True if the XML document is valid; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Thrown if the XSD file is not found at the specified path.
Thrown if there is an issue reading the XSD file.
Thrown if the XML document fails schema validation.
Thrown if the XML schema or document is invalid.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.SomiodController.GenerateTimestampName(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a unique name by appending a timestamp to the base name.
member.param: The base name to which the timestamp will be appended.
member.returns: A string combining the base name and the current timestamp in the format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss'. For example: If is "model", the result will be "model_20240617_103045".
